==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しも|いち|だん|かつ|よう|yomi=y}}

===Etymology===
A compound of {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|下一段|tr=shimo ichidan||lower monograde}} and {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|活用|tr=katsuyō||conjugation}}. All earlier [[下二段活用|lower bigrade]] verbs turn into lower monograde. Lower refers to the -e stem and contrasts with the [[下二段活用|upper]] -i. Monograde refers to the one-way -e, contrasting with the two-way e/u variation in [[下二段活用|bigrades]].
